 I. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהַג‎</span> **verb** ==drive, conduct== (Late Hebrew ***conduct oneself, behave, be accustomed***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> go along the road, keep to the road; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְהַג‎</span> lead); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Lam.3.2|Lam 3:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָָֽהֲגוּ‎</span> [[1Sam.30.20|1Sam 30:20]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנְהַג‎</span> [[Isa.20.4|Isa 20:4]], etc.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהַג‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]] ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹהֵג‎</span> [[Isa.11.6|Isa 11:6]] + 2 t., etc.; passive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְהוּגִים‎</span> [[Isa.60.11|Isa 60:11]] — 

**1.** ***drive***, flocks [[Exod.3.1|Exod 3:1]] compare (in predict.) [[Isa.11.6|Isa 11:6]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span>); figurative, object Joseph, [[Ps.80.2|Ps 80:2]] (simile of flock); hence, object human being, lead on, [[Song.8.2|Song 8:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵבִיא אֶלֿ‎</span>)); also figurative, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, [[Lam.3.2|Lam 3:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺלִיךְ‎</span>); passive participle of kings ***led*** in procession [[Isa.60.11|Isa 60:11]] compare [[BDB#Di|Di]] (rather than as captives, [[BDB#Che|Che]], as earlier usage; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵבִיא‎</span>); ***drive away, off***, (object <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִקְנֶה‎</span>) [[Gen.31.18|Gen 31:18]] ( of Jacob, going by stealth); usually as booty (object flocks and herds) [[1Sam.23.5|1Sam 23:5]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חמור יתומים ינהגו‎</span> [[Job.24.3|Job 24:3]] (unjustly); compare [[1Sam.30.2|1Sam 30:2]] (twice in verse) (read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּנְהֲגוּ‎</span> [[BDB#We|We]] [[BDB#Dr|Dr]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]] [[BDB#Bu|Bu]], compare [[BDB#The|Th]], not [[BDB#HPS|HPS]] q. v. ), v[[1Sam.30.22|1Sam 30:22]] (no object expressed but really captives \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלַךְ‎</span>), [[Isa.20.4|Isa 20:4]] drive an ass for riding [[2Kgs.4.24|2Kgs 4:24]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָלַךְ‎</span>); a cart (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲגָלָה‎</span>) [[2Sam.6.3|2Sam 6:3]] = [[1Chr.13.7|1Chr 13:7]] (where <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּע‎</span>); absolute of driving chariot [[2Kgs.9.20|2Kgs 9:20]] lead out an army to battle (late) [[1Chr.20.12|1Chr 20:12]]; [[1Chr.25.11|1Chr 25:11]]. 

**2.** figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְלִבִּי‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹהֵג בַּחָכְמָה‎</span> [[Eccl.2.3|Eccl 2:3]] my heart ***behaving itself*** in wisdom (compare Late Hebrew above). **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִהַג‎</span> [[Exod.10.3|Exod 10:3]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִהַ֫גְתָּ‎</span> [[Isa.63.14|Isa 63:14]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְנַהֵג‎</span> [[Deut.4.27|Deut 4:27]], etc.; — 

**1.** ***drive away, lead off***, followed by accusative, daughters of Laban [[Gen.31.26|Gen 31:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גָּנַב‎</span>); of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, ***leading off*** people into exile, followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֫מָּה‎</span> [[Deut.4.27|Deut 4:27]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵפִיץ‎</span>), [[Deut.28.37|Deut 28:37]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הוֺלִיךְ‎</span>). 

**2.** ***lead on, guide***, followed by accusative, subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.78.52|Ps 78:52]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּעֵ֫דֶר‎</span> \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסִּיעַ כַּצּאֹן‎</span>); [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִהֵל‎</span>, compare [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]]); [[Isa.63.14|Isa 63:14]]; [[Isa.48.15|Isa 48:15]] guide on, a wind, [[Exod.10.13|Exod 10:13]] (followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּאָרֶץ‎</span>), [[Ps.78.26|Ps 78:26]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִסִּיעַ‎</span>). 

**3.** ***cause to drive*** (compare **Qal**, [[2Kgs.9.20|2Kgs 9:20]]) [[Exod.14.25|Exod 14:25]] ([[BDB#J|J]] [[BDB#E|E]]; subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span>, see [[BDB#Di|Di]]) 



 II. [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָהַג‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==moan, lament== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***be out of breath, pant, breathe heavily***; Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***sigh, groan***); — 

**Pi\`el** ***Participle*** feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְנַהֲגוֺה‎</span> [[Nah.2.8|Nah 2:8]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כְּקוֺל יוֺנִים‎</span> ).
